attributes.action: STOP the proposed BELOW INFLATION pay rise for Nurses, the SECOND YEAR RUNNING!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the SECOND year running the Goverment has hinted at a BELOW INFLATION payrise for Nurses. This means a PAY CUT in real terms!!! This is the second year running, what happened to Agenda for Change? ENOUGH is ENOUGH. It's time for Nurses to make a stand and stop this now, with Industrial Action if necessary. We are seeing RECORD NUMBERS of patients, with same staffing levels as years ago for LESS PAY! where is the patient safety? where is the fairness in this???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
